text:
Use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2009
	The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31 March 2009 isauthorised to the amount of £7,425,726,000.
Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31 March 2009
	The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom andapply to the service of the year ending with 31 March 2009 the sum of£32,112,484,000.
Use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2010
	The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31 March 2010 isauthorised to the amount of £202,426,196,000.
Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31 March 2010
	The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom andapply to the service of the year ending with 31 March 2010 the sum of£194,439,006,000.
Short title
	This Act may be cited as the Consolidated Fund Act 2008.
